name: AP_CLAIM_IF_GOB4_NARRAY
description: This table extracts data received from PPS pricer for a claim in GOB4.DRG 'DRG Procedure Indicator'.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: OP_DRG_PROC_IND
columns.description: Flag that shows how each procedure code was utilized by the grouper. For inpatient diagnosis related group grouping only. Data received in GOB4.DRG block on incoming message.
